dataList.dlg: Mm~ What nice weather. Right, so who needed my protection?
It's no easy feat to wake up early in the morning... But with weather as nice as this, you just feel refreshed when you get up, yeah?
For lunch... let's keep it simple with donuts and coffee. What? You're sick of 'em? Too bad, these are the staple diet of a Fixer on stakeout~!
Aw, geez... Can't I take these sunglasses off? I can't see a thing through this dark tint~
My job~ It's to protect appointed persons. Make sure my client doesn't feel bothered at all~ I can be a natural shield like that.
...Fuhu, you think I might stand out? Whew~ I'm more worried about the others, really.
A stealth mission like this... ugh, it's too boring... won't anything please happen?
Ah~ You're here? Not used to seeing me wear the Association coat? Well, I have many forms~

Don't come too close. You'll get blood on you.
And that's... not a very good look, is it?
Hnnnngh~ Phew. Lemme take a nap for a minute~
It's good to be recognized~ Hm... Though, I'd prefer better pay for the missions~
Sunglasses off~
Commencing mission.
Stay behind my back!
Subduing target!
Phew~ Did they get knocked out cold?
Oh, oh boy...
Threat, removed~
Ah... but... my performance records...
Heh, that's easy~
T-This isn't one of my specialties, y'know...
Whew~ That's another smooth-sailing mission! How about we grab a beer on the way back?
A perfect mission! Fuhu, please hire Zwei again!
Crap... Now I've got letters of explanation to write... Sniffle.
